wikipedia_page.main: Clive Holland is an English television and radio presenter. From 2009 to 2013 he presented the BBC One daytime show Cowboy Trap. He has also presented other programmes such as GMTV and Channel 4’s ‘Big Big’ Holiday Show and on stage at the Ideal Home Show, the RHS Hampton Court Flower Show and London Fashion Week.

response: *Clive Holland, presenter of BBC One's Cowboy Trap
